text: Dunedin Hospital is a hospital in Dunedin, New Zealand. == History == The original hospital was built in the centre of Dunedin in 1851, and moved to in 1865. === 2007 Norovirus outbreak === In March 2007 two wards of the hospital were closed because of a suspected outbreak of norovirus. On 16 August 2008 the hospital was put in lockdown for one week. === COVID-19 pandemic === In June 2022, the Dunedin Hospital was closed to visitors after an outbreak of COVID-19 within its wards. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Buildings and structures in New Zealand Category:Buildings and structures completed in the 19th century Category:Hospitals Category:Dunedin Category:19th-century establishments in New Zealand Category:1851 establishments in Oceania
title: Dunedin Hospital
